pages.text: Eidolon is a dark magic mod that allows you to delve into the occult.$(br2)Learn how to perform powerful rituals and transmute items with alchemy ... as well as practice necromancy.$(br2)Oh, and don't forget to commune with your Dark Lord!
The Ars Ecclesia will help guide your descent into $(m)madness$() $(o)enlightenment$().
